articles.title: National Meeting Marks First Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks First Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture Saturday to mark the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, labor innovators and other people and scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					 KPA General Hyon Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the KPA General Staff, made a report.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership was a historic event of great significance in developing the revolutionary armed forces in the DPRK and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 This gave a steady continuity to the tradition of arms of Mt. Paektu left by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the greatest legacy of patriotism and provided a sure guarantee for the ever-victorious future of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un displayed distinguished military wisdom and qualifications as a brilliant commander, getting closely associated with arms in his teens. He made an immortal contribution to the development of the revolutionary armed forces as the closest Songun revolutionary comrade and military aide to leader Kim Jong Il, enjoying boundless reverence and trust from service personnel and people.
					
					 It is the greatest fortune and honor for the WPK, the army and people to hold Kim Jong Un, another great man of Mt. Paektu type, at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces and glorify the history and tradition of ever-victorious Songun revolution down through generations.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is a genius of military affairs who is further developing Juche-based military idea and theory with his brilliant wisdom and rare commanding art and ushering in a heyday of army-building.
					
					 He has successfully carried forward the Juche-oriented idea and theories of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on army building, clearly indicating the path of eternal victory for the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He is an iron-willed brilliant commander as he firmly defends the country, revolution and socialism with his matchless pluck and grit.
					
					 He truly represents the might of the great Paektusan power and the banner of its eternal victory as he resolutely safeguards the country, revolution and socialism with his matchless pluck and toughest counter-measure at the supreme headquarters on the forefront of revolution and draws an arrow for the victory in the great battle for national reunification.
					
					 He is a great master of creation and construction as he let the revolutionary army play a vanguard role in working miracles in the drive for prosperity.
					
					 He is not only a peerlessly illustrious commander demonstrating the might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, the military power of Juche, with his outstanding idea and experienced and tested leadership ability and noble virtues but the great sun in the new century as he carves out a bright future for the Korean nation and mankind.
					
					 The reporter called for building a thriving socialist nation at an early date, achieving national reunification and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un, adding that the country's reunification was the life-long desire of the great Generalissimos and the greatest historic task of the nation the fulfillment of which is desired by the Korean people so much.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who are always keeping sharp eyes on the anti-DPRK war maneuvers of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers will firmly guarantee the peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula with an invincible military capacity and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans, the reporter declared, stressing that only victory and glory are in store for the DPRK advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, holding high the flag of the WPK as the supreme colors of revolution.

articles.title: Senior Party Officials Visit Contributors to Satellite Launch in Hotel
articles.content:
Senior Party Officials Visit Contributors to Satellite Launch in Hotel 
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the hotel where scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 put up.
					 They included Secretaries Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae and Kwak Pom Gi, First Vice Department Director Jo Yon Jun, and department directors, first vice department directors and vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 They warmly congratulated the space conquerors who reached the acme of honor and happiness under the loving care of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and wished them rosy future.
					
					 The senior officials hoped that they would make great achievements in scientific researches into the development of a series of working satellites and more efficient carrier rockets, bearing in mind the trust of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The contributors vowed to make positive contributions to successfully carrying out the party's plan for building a space power.

articles.title: New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Hu Jintao, Wen Jiabao
articles.content:
New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Hu Jintao, Wen Jiabao
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received New Year cards from Hu Jintao, president of the People's Republic of China, and Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council of the PRC.
					 New Year cards were conveyed to an official concerned by Guan Huabing, minister of the Chinese embassy here, on Friday.

articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Malian President
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Malian President 
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a New Year card from Malian President Dioncounda Traore on Dec. 5. 
					 He sincerely wished on behalf of the Malian people and on his own behalf Kim Jong Un happiness in good health and the friendly Korean people prosperity. 
					
					 He expressed belief that 2013 will be a year of great successes by the joint efforts of the two countries for world peace, solidarity and progress. 
					
					 He extended his best regards.

articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a New Year card from Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Dec. 24. 
					 The Palestinian president in the card said that he was pleased to extend the warmest and sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the State of Palestine and its people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the new year 2013. He wished Kim Jong Un happiness in good health and the DPRK welfare, prosperity and stability, expressing belief that 2013 will be a year of welfare, peace and friendship for the Palestinians and all other peoples in the world.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Zhang Weihua
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Saturday received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the first anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year 2013.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK-Russia Joint Fishery Committee Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK-Russia Joint Fishery Committee Back Home 
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK-Russia Joint Fishery Committee led by Kang Yong Chol, vice-minister of Fisheries, returned home on Saturday after taking part in the 26th meeting of the DPRK-Russia Joint Fishery Committee held in Russia.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch Tour Pyongyang Folklore Park
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch Tour Pyongyang Folklore Park
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful satellite launch toured the Pyongyang Folklore Park on Saturday.
					 Its employees warmly welcomed them with bunches of flowers. 
					
					 They were briefed on the fact that the Pyongyang Folklore Park was successfully built on a vast area at the foot of Mt. Taesong thanks to the deep love of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un for the country and the nation.
					
					 They admired the wisdom and skills of the ancestors, looking round miniatures of mausoleums of successive kings in Korea -- Tangun, Tongmyong and Wang Kon -- and Sokkul Grotto and Chomsongdae.
					
					 Viewing structures of reduced sizes in the modern area such as the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, Grand People's Study House and the Chollima Statue, they recalled with deep emotion the proud years during which the Korean people have achieved victory and glory, holding the peerlessly great men in high esteem.
					
					 At various dwelling houses dating back to the period of Korean feudal dynasty in the folklore village area they tasted Pyongyang cold noodles, tangogi soups and mung-bean pancakes which were prepared according to the cooking methods in that period.

articles.title: Uljibong-trademarked Toilet Soap Popular among DPRK People
articles.content:
Uljibong-trademarked Toilet Soap Popular among DPRK People
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Toilet soap produced by the Uljibong Joint Venture Company is getting popularity among consumers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Made with mixtures of solanine, vitamins, organic and amino acids extracted from potato, this soap is known to give medicinal effect.
					
					 Contained in potato mash are vitamins C, B1, B2, B3, B6, carotin and amino acid like cystin, which help soften skin and activate metabolism. Such substances also help prevent radiation and thoroughly wash skin.

articles.title: Sports Enthusiasm Sweeps DPRK in 2012
articles.content:
Sports Enthusiasm Sweeps DPRK in 2012
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has paid big efforts to developing sports this year.
					 In the year, Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, watched local men's soccer and women's volleyball matches on the spots, setting forth the important tasks instrumental to radically developing the nation's sports.
					
					 He met the athletes who bagged gold metals at the 30th Olympiad, and their coaches and had a photo taken with them. He also provided sports teams with varieties of sports equipment.
					
					 The November enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea adopted a decision on setting up the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, which is empowered to give unified guidance to the nation's overall sports activities.
					
					 This year witnessed many sports contests, including Paektusan Prize Sports Contest in February, Mangyongdae Prize National Sports Festival in April and Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize in May-June. In particular, sports enthusiasm soared high with the 12th People's Games as an occasion. The contests produced new domestic, Asian and world's records in many events.
					
					 The National Taekwon-do Festival was held to mark the Day of the Sun in April, the National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup in June and the National Martial Art Championship for "September 10 Prize" in September.
					
					 The IAAF-25th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon took place on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (April 15) and the 21st Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (February 16).
					
					 Meanwhile, mass sports activities and events have been organized this year. Especially, a table-tennis tournament, attended by officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions, is now under way in Pyongyang.
					
					 Those sports activities and events helped further develop the nation's sports techniques while fanning up sports enthusiasm among broad sections of people across the country.
					
					 This year also witnessed the emergence of modern sports facilities in different parts of the country, including Taekwon-Do Holy Center, Yanggakdo Sports Village, People's Open-air Ice Rink and Skate Park, which will be conducive to the development of the nation's sports and physical training of people, including youth and children.

articles.title: Education Improved in DPRK in 2012
articles.content:
Education Improved in DPRK in 2012
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made a long stride in education this year.
					 The Sixth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly, held on Sept. 25, promulgated an ordinance on enforcing universal 12-year compulsory education.
					
					 Big efforts were paid to putting education on IT basis to meet the need of the era of knowledge-based economy. Computer-based education has stood on a high level at universities and other schools.
					
					 Further improvement was made in contents and ways of education as well as qualification of teachers. New subjects were added to education at universities.
					
					 A number of universities, including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, made contributions to developing the nano products and streamlining the production processes at Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill and other factories.
					
					 The DPRK won two gold medals at the 53rd International Math Olympiad and the top and special prizes at the 20th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest.
					
					 The achievements were attributable to the dear respected Kim Jong Un's deep care and wise guidance over education.
					
					 He visited Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Changjon Primary School and Kyongsang Kindergarten, giving important instructions for the development of education. He also sent many advanced educational and sports apparatuses to the schools.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Peerlessly Great Man (18)
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Peerlessly Great Man (18)
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime was possessed of gifted leadership art.
					 As a master of President Kim Il Sung's leadership art, he gave flawless answers to the theoretical and practical matters concerning the leadership art.
					
					 He had written a number of works on leadership art, including "Let Us Make Party Work Thorough Work with People", since he began working at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea in the 1960s.
					
					 In particular, he systemized the leadership method and art as part of the constitution of the Juche idea at a national meeting of party information workers held on Feb. 19, 1974. He stressed that the leadership art of Juche is mass-based, revolutionary, scientific and encyclopedic one.
					
					 He defined the working method of Juche, established by President Kim Il Sung, as Kim Il Sung's style of work and gave a profound scientific exposition of its features.
					
					 He set forth the slogan "We Serve the People!" and always urged the officials to be faithful servants for the popular masses.
					
					 He also led the officials to equip themselves with intense loyalty and devotion to the party, the leader and the masses as well as noble virtues and popular working style.

articles.title: DPRK's Peaceful Space Development, Exercise of Legitimate Sovereign Right: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Peaceful Space Development, Exercise of Legitimate Sovereign Right: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's satellite launch is an exercise of its legitimate sovereign right as it is in line with international law, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 The DPRK's satellite launch is just because it is an exercise of the sovereign and independent right fully conforming with the Space Treaty stipulating the use of outer space for peaceful purposes as a right of all countries, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 In order to promote international confidence and strengthen cooperation in the space scientific researches for peaceful purposes and satellite launch, the DPRK acceded to international space treaties including the Space Treaty in March 2009 and since then has strictly observed the right and duty of the treaties.
					
					 It notified relevant international organizations of the satellite launch in April this year and invited competent experts in space scientific and technological field and journalists of different countries to the General Satellite Control and Command Center as an exception.
					
					 It launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 in a legitimate manner after going through relevant procedures.
					
					 The principle of independence should become a basis of all principles and norms of international law and its guiding principle. This is because the principle of independence is in line with the intrinsic requirements of mankind and the requirements of the present times dynamically advancing toward the road of independence and it is also basic guidelines to be inevitably maintained in developing relations among countries in a just and fair manner.
					
					 That is why the DPRK has worked hard with indomitable faith and will that one cannot abandon the sovereignty of the country and nation though one may give up one's life, and it launched its satellite for the second time after April this year.
					
					 The DPRK is aiming at advancing into space for peaceful purposes as a full-fledged member of the international community. It has the choice of space advance and the right to aspire after the development of space science and technology.
					
					 It will continue exercising the independent right to launch satellites which conforms with international law and the world trend no matter what others may say.

articles.title: Improvement of North-South Relations Impossible with Confrontation Maniacs Still at Large: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Improvement of North-South Relations Impossible with Confrontation Maniacs Still at Large: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' confrontation hysteria has reached its extremes this year, creating a constant danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 After commencing his "New Year work" while letting out invectives inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen, the Lee group has been hell-bent on the moves for confrontation of social systems all the year round.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presented itself, Lee talked about "consistent policy toward the north and "wind of change". He went the lengths of blustering that if the north does not abandon "its will to develop nuclear weapons and missiles", south Korea should "opt for focusing its attention on the change of system". Needless to say, this is a revelation of the group's criminal attempt to realize its treacherous ambition for "unification of social systems" while denying the idea and system of fellow countrymen.
					
					 The group's attempt at "unification of social systems" is clearly evidenced by its ridiculous charade about "unification jar" simulating "contingency" of the north.
					
					 The desperate moves of the group staking its lot at the confrontation of social systems reached their climax in an effort to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The hideous state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorist act which sparked off resentment and astonishment among all Koreans and the world brought into bolder relief what a dangerous stage the Lee group's racket for confrontation of social systems has reached.
					
					 Dependence on foreign forces is the Lee group's peculiar mode of existence.
					
					 The row kicked off by the group for confrontation with the DPRK in league with foreign forces has reached its climax through "human rights" abuses.
					
					 The ultimate aim of the confrontation policy sought by the group is to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The group rounded off its scenario for preemptive attack on the DPRK under the simulated conditions of an actual war through large-scale joint military exercises. They assumed extremely provocative and protracted nature not only in their contents but in their period and scale. 
					
					 The north-south relations can never improve as long as traitors are allowed to pursue their confrontation policy of antagonizing fellow countrymen in south Korea. This is a lesson drawn again by all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad, looking back upon this year.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK and Situation on Korean Peninsula: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK and Situation on Korean Peninsula: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The political and military circumstances on the Korean Peninsula this year have reached the extreme phase of tensions, arousing concerns of the international community.
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK was always behind all the extreme developments which coiled up the tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The policy intensified by the Obama administration was little different from the preceding one. This was vividly evidenced by its grave provocations against the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 In June last the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea staged largest-ever joint live-fire drill in the area south of the Demilitarized Zone in league with the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, kicking off reckless rackets such as daring aim at the DPRK flag. This is a heinous anti-DPRK act like a war act.
					
					 The U.S. denied the DPRK's development of space for peaceful purposes. No sooner had the DPRK announced its plan to launch Kwangmyongsong 3-1 than the U.S. unilaterally announced that it would stop the food provision, quite contrary to its claim that it does not link the humanitarian issue with politics. This resulted in breaching the February 29 DPRK-U.S. agreement.
					
					 Fearing the objective confirmation of the peaceful nature of the DPRK's satellite launch, the U.S. is orchestrating hostile acts of encroaching upon the DPRK's just right to launch satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, labeling it a long-distance missile launch.
					
					 The U.S. left no stone unturned to carry out its foreign policy in a bid to execute its anti-DPRK acts. 
					
					 The U.S. administration and think-tank cried out for the "logic of threat from north Korea" with an aim to justify the strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. The "third Armitage report" published by the group of experts for supra-partisan diplomacy and security said the U.S. and Japan are exposed to threats from north Korea equipped with nuclear weapons. The U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies in its report submitted at the request of the U.S. Defense Department claimed that north Korea is the primary threat to the U.S. in Asia.
					
					 The commander-in-chief of the U.S. forces in the Pacific region cried out for getting prepared to ensure security from provocation of north Korea and the deputy commander of the U.S. 8th Army said that the mission to deter threat from Pyongyang is important as never before now that the U.S. forces are shifting their emphasis to the Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. has escalated military pressure and blackmail against the DPRK. This is the main cause of the tensions that ran high on the Korean Peninsula this year. At the beginning of the year the U.S. officially signed the "plan for jointly coping with local provocations" which envisaged the involvement of the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. forces in Japan and the Pacific in case of the contingency on the peninsula. This plan, part of its new defense strategy, aims to ignite a Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. has intensified war maneuvers against the DPRK. They were staged according to OPLAN 5027, a scenario for an overall war on the peninsula, and OPLAN 5029, a scenario for surprise attack operation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet army in "contingency." They were staged under the simulated conditions of "removal of the weapons of mass destruction", attack operation such as strike at commanding post and "removal of nuclear facilities" through Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Focus Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 In June alone the U.S. staged joint exercises in the South Sea of Korea together with Japan and the south Korean puppet army and joint naval exercise in the West Sea of Korea with the puppet army with nuclear carrier George Washington involved. 
					
					 The U.S. aggravated the situation while crying out for the initiatives for military cooperation to cope with someone's "threat", instigating traitor Lee Myung Bak keen on igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Top U.S. military officials often had secret confabs with the south Korean warmongers at which they vociferated about "completion of the plan for joint operation" and the "provision of deterrent forces including a nuclear umbrella".
					
					 Clarified in the operational plan of the past war confabs was the mode of war operation that an overall war will be orchestrated by the U.S. and local war by the south Korean puppet army in case a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula. But the new joint operational plan was amended to the effect that the U.S. and south Korea will jointly cope with the local war.
					
					 The U.S. gave the south Korean puppet forces a free rein as regards the use of missiles so that they can put the whole areas of the DPRK in the firing range and strike them. This provided a condition for a preemptive strike at the DPRK, indicating what extent the U.S. reckless war hysteria to egg the south Korean puppet forces on to wage a war against the DPRK has reached.
					
					 The U.S. is driven into a tight corner as regards the Korean issue.
					
					 A spokesman for the U.S. State Department in a recent press briefing said the DPRK's rocket launch as planned showed that the U.S. policy toward the DPRK failed.
					
					 A senior researcher at the U.S. Cato Research Institute referred to the infeasibility and uselessness of the Obama Administration's Korea policy. The U.S. is falling into a pitfall as regards its policy toward north Korea, he noted, adding the Obama Administration's policy toward north Korea is risking the worst result.
					
					 Bottom-line is for Washington to change its present strategy in a bold way, he said. It is foolish to call for following in the footsteps of the decades-long policy which produced very useless results, he added.
					
					 It is very just when the DPRK decided to bolster up its war deterrent to cope with the worst situation on the Korean Peninsula created by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. had better clearly understand its rival and roll back at once its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Driving Workers to Death
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Driving Workers to Death
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions on Dec. 23 issued a commentary denouncing the unpopular rule of the "government" authorities driving workers to death.
					 The commentary recalled that some days ago three young workers committed suicides in protest against their harsh rule. This was attributable to the lay-off, expansion of part-time jobs and suppression of trade unions by the Lee Myung Bak regime, it added.
					
					 What they desired was just the right to work, the right to be paid for the work done by them and the right to trade union activities, it noted.
					
					 They chose death at last without any hope for future, it said, saying that the Lee Myung Bak regime is entirely to blame for this situation.
					
					 The commentary accused the authorities of not taking any measure for the workers in their actions despite cold in demand of their right to existence.
					
					 The organization will launch a new struggle and make every possible effort to prevent the workers' continued death, the commentary warned.
					
					 It called upon all workers to rise up in actions in a do-or-die spirit.

articles.title: Settlement of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1 053rd Wednesday rally for the settlement of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in Seoul on Dec. 26.
					 At the rally speakers said that they felt it painful to think of the victims of the sexual slavery who died before wresting apology and reparation from the Japanese government.
					
					 They demanded the Japanese government abide by international law in a responsible manner, not abusing the rights of the victims any longer.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to make positive efforts to pressurize Japan to honestly liquidate its past crimes.
					
					 They declared they would fight till the issue of sexual slavery is settled, reflecting the voices of world conscience critical of war-time sexual abuses.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Accused of Shielding GI Criminal
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Accused of Shielding GI Criminal
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Taegu District Court on Dec. 26 committed such submissive act as shielding a GI criminal who smuggled drugs into south Korea.
					 A GI, who served in a base of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in Chilgok, North Kyongsang Province in March last, was caught red handed while smuggling a new kind of drugs through a U.S. mail company. 
					
					 The public censure of this crime compelled the puppet regime to hold a mockery of trial of the GI. But the court halved the punishment demanded very light for the accused and declared stay of execution, claiming that he deeply repented of his wrongdoings and there was harsh aspect in the punishment.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime is unreasonably shielding the U.S. imperialist aggression forces who have unhesitatingly committed all sorts of crimes while mercilessly suppressing the just struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification.  
					
					 This sycophantic behavior is touching off resentment among south Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany 
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was published in booklet by a publishing house of Germany. 
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Dec. 24.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and broadcasting services carried special write-ups or aired special programs accompanied by portraits of leader Kim Jong Il to commemorate the first anniversary of his demise. 
					 The Lao newspaper Pasason on Dec. 17 carried the following article:
					
					 Kim Jong Il whom the Korean people are holding in high esteem as their eternal leader is a model of genuine patriots. 
					
					 How ardent Kim Jong Il's patriotism was can be clearly proved by the wisdom and efforts he devoted to the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of Songun late in the last century when the imperialists' political, economic and military offensive to stifle the DPRK reached its extremes. 
					
					 The Lao newspaper Vientiane Mai on Dec. 17 said that thanks to the superhuman energy and self-sacrificing devotion of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK could rank itself among a few manufacturers and launchers of satellites and nuclear weapons states in the world and came to lay  strong foundations of the powerful self-supporting national economy equipped with latest technology. 
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on Dec. 17 and the Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on Dec. 16 carried articles praising the feats of Kim Jong Il, who devoted himself to the development of the Workers' Party of Korea and the prosperity of socialist Korea. 
					
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise on Dec. 17 devoted a whole page to an article titled "On the occasion of the first anniversary of demise of H.E. Kim Jong Il, the eternal leader of the Korean people".
					
					 The State Radio of Uganda praised his undying feats on the same day. 
					
					 The Nepali paper Arpan on Dec. 21 carried articles introducing his Songun leadership exploits.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in foreign countries to commemorate the first anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Remembrance meetings, seminars, book, photo and handcrafts exhibitions and film shows were held in Vietnam, Kuwait, Indonesia, Nepal, Serbia, Dominica, Tunisia and Equatorial Guinea from Dec. 14 to 21. 
					
					 The head of an office of the Defense Ministry of Vietnam said at the film show:
					
					 As it held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its supreme commander the Korean People's Army developed into matchless revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 I was deeply moved by the fact that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un visited a women's coastal artillery company in August to learn in detail about its soldiers' training and their living and had photos taken with all of its soldiers. 
					
					 The chairman of the Kuwaiti Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said at the remembrance meeting:
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed undying exploits while triumphantly leading the Korean revolution for half a century. The DPRK is now increasing its might under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The desire of Kim Jong Il will surely come true as long as the DPRK is under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The general chairman and the general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said at the book and photo exhibition that Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly great man who made great contributions to the happiness of the Korean people, the prosperity of the country and global independence. 
					
					 The Nepali vice prime minister and concurrently foreign minister said at an opening ceremony of the book and photo exhibition that the feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will always be remembered by the Nepali people. 
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Serbia and Tunisia.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Marked in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Marked in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee released its bulletin "Successful succession to revolutionary cause of Juche" on Dec. 23 to mark the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The Korean people achieved the historic victories in the anti-Japanese armed struggle for the liberation of Korea and the Fatherland Liberation War fought against the U.S. imperialists' aggression and successfully carried out two-phase social revolution. 
					
					 The DPRK defended the banner of socialism and ushered in a new era of building a thriving nation without the slightest vacillation from the great political turmoil in which socialism collapsed in East European countries. 
					
					 First Secretary Kim Jong Un is the great heir to the revolutionary cause of Juche which has covered a complex and arduous course of history. 
					
					 He is possessed of strong faith in the revolutionary cause, warm love for the people, outstanding political insight, wisdom and distinguished leadership art. 
					
					 He is resolutely frustrating the imperialists' moves to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Orbiting in Space: Russian TV
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Orbiting in Space: Russian TV
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Space Information Center of Russia confirmed that satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 of the DPRK is orbiting in space.
					 The Russian State Television RTR said on Friday:
					
					 The Russian Space Information Center, which boasts its nearly 50 year-long history, opened to media its activities for the first time. There is in the suburbs of Moscow the center called an eye monitoring anywhere of the space.
					
					 The duty of its service personnel is to detect and track objects in space orbit and confirm their entity. 
					
					 The DPRK's satellite is now drawing attention of the center's staff members on duty. It continues its flight, not disturbing any space modules.
					
					 RTR showed scenes of service personnel in the center monitoring the space on an electronic display and its commanding officer saying that "the DPRK's satellite is now flying in the sky above the Pacific."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un firma carta enviada por la japonesa naturalizada Rim Kyong Sim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un firma carta enviada por la japonesa naturalizada Rim Kyong Sim
						
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dejo manuscrito el dia 26 en la portada de la carta que le enviara Rim Kyong Sim, japonesa naturalizada con ciudadania coreana que vive en la comuna de Janghung del distrito de Yonggwang de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					En su autografo, el Mariscal escribio que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea cuida con mas afecto a los que sufren las heridas del alma.
					
					A la madre le duele mas cuando ve a sus hijos angustiados y ella dedica todo lo suyo como carne y sangre para salvarlos, senalo.
					
					Pienso que todas las madres del mundo se sienten mas felices y afortunadas cuando vayan bien las cosas de sus hijos y por esta razon, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea es comparado con la madre, apunto.
					
					Prosiguio que leyendo la carta enviada por Rim, compartio la alegria con ella que se puso tan contenta por el ingreso de su hijo mayor Ri Chol Ho a las filas del PTC, con lo que sonaba mucho.
					
					Prometio que el partido conducira y ayudara bien a su hijo para que el trabaje bien en su cargo y agradecio la invariable confianza que deposita ella en el partido.
					
					En su misiva remitida el dia primero, Rim Kyong Sim escribio que a pesar de su condicion de japonesa naturalizada, ella habia sido tratada sin ninguna discriminacion, al contrario, recibio atencion especial en los dias de fiesta y cumpleanos y se le han facilitado todas las condiciones de vida hasta durante la Marcha penosa, periodo mas dificil para el pueblo coreano.
					
					Aunque su hijo Ri Chol Ho habia sido penalizado por 3 anos debido a su pecado, el no fue abandonado sino educado y formado como cuadro de una entidad basica de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, relato. 
					
					Ademas, fue elegido como delegado a los festejos del 60o aniversario de esa entidad juvenil y trabaja ahora como jefe de brigada de trabajo luego de graduarse del Instituto Universitario de Agricultura de Wonsan, expreso.
					
					Con motivo del 59o aniversario de la direccion en el terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung al Centro de Posturas de Sericultura de Hamhung, adscrito a la Direccion de Sericultura y Seda, el fue admitido al PTC, apunto.
					
					Al final, Rim expreso agradecimiento al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien pese a estar muy ocupado por atender multiples cuestiones del Estado, dispenso todos los favores para su familia.

articles.title: Acto central por nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del EPC 
						
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el primer aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los innovadores laborales y trabajadores. 
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron al lanzamiento exitoso de la unidad no. 2 del satelite artificial de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3".
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hyon Yong Chol, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					El orador dijo que el nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del EPC es el acontecimiento historico de suma importancia en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Ese evento posibilita continuar firmemente el linaje de las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu, herencias patrioticas de los grandes Generalisimos, y garantiza el futuro invicto de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, enfatizo y continuo:
					
					El Mariscal mostro ya en sus diez anos la inteligencia y la capacidad militares del general e hizo gran aporte al desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, siendo el mas intimo camarada revolucionaria del Songun y primer asistente militar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					De esta manera, se disfruto de la infinita veneracion y confianza de los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes.
					
					Tener en el primer puesto de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias al Mariscal, otro gran hombre del monte Paektu, y continuar la historia invicta y la tradicion de la revolucion del Songun es la maxima fortuna y gloria del PTC, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					El Mariscal es el gran maestro de los asuntos militares quien con su inteligencia y el arte de mando militar excepcionales profundiza y desarrolla la idea y las teorias militares autoctonas y abre la era de prosperidad de la construccion del ejercito.
					
					Al continuar satisfactoriamente la autoctona idea y las teorias del Presidente y del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del ejercito, ilumino claramente el camino a seguir por el ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu. 
					
					El Mariscal es el general de acero que con gran audacia y coraje defiende firmemente la patria, la revolucion y el socialismo. 
					
					El significa la fuerza de la potencia del monte Paektu y bandera de la victoria eterna. 
					
					Tiene la Comandancia Suprema en el frente avanzado de la revolucion, defiende con la audacia incomparable y las contramedidas intransigentes la patria, la revolucion y el socialismo y conduce a la victoria la batalla por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					El Mariscal es el genio en la creacion y construccion quien alcanza los milagros por la prosperidad nacional poniendo al frente al ejercito revolucionario. 
					
					El gran sol del nuevo siglo manifiesta a todo el mundo el poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y la potencia militar de tipo jucheano con la destacada ideologia, la probada y veterana capacidad directiva y la noble virtud y abre el radiante futuro de la nacion coreana y de la humanidad. 
					
					Se debe levantar cuanto antes el Estado prospero socialista, reunificar la patria y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, apoyando con fidelidad la ideologia y la direccion del Mariscal. 
					
					La reunificacion de la patria fue el anhelo de toda la vida de los grandes Generalisimos y la suprema tarea nacional. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea garantizaran firmemente con el invencible poderio militar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, observando siempre con alta vigilancia las  maniobras de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas, y realizaran sin falta la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas unidas de la toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					Habra siempre victorias y glorias en el avance de nosotros que marchamos bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un sosteniendo la bandera del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como primer estandarte de la revolucion.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido visitan albergue de participantes en lanzamiento de satellite
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido visitan albergue de participantes en lanzamiento de satelite 
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los secretarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae y Kwak Pom Gi, el primer subjete de departamento Jo Yon Jun, jefes, primeros subjefes y subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC visitaron el albergue de los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron al lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3".
					Los visitantes dieron calurosas felicitaciones a los conquistadores del cosmos, que llegaron a la cima de gloria y felicidad gracias a la atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y les bendijeron el futuro maravilloso. 
					
					Y les encomendaron tener siempre presente la  confianza del Mariscal y lograr grandes exitos en la investigacion cientifica y tecnica para desarrollar mucho mas satelites de usos practicos y cohetes transportadores mas potentes. 
					
					Los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios tomaron la decision de haceer gran aporte a realizar con brillantez el proyecto del partido de construir una potencia espacial.

articles.title: Relevantes exitos deportivos de la RPDC en 2012
articles.content:
Relevantes exitos deportivos de la RPDC en 2012
						
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El 2012 fue un ano significativo para la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que aspira a la potencia deportiva.
					Tras presenciar los partidos de futbol masculino y el voleibol femenino, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un estimulo a los jugadores y presento las tareas que serviran de guia en desarrollar trascendentalmente el deporte del pais.
					
					Se reunio y se retrato con los campeones olimpicos de Londres y sus entrenadores y envio muchos equipos de ejercicio a los deportistas.
					
					La reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, efectuada en noviembre pasado, devino momento historico que dejo abierta la fase decisiva para realizar el proyecto del partido de construir una potencia deportiva.
					
					En la reunion se aprobo la resolucion de organizar el Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes.
					
					Se elevo dia tras dia la atencion social al sector deportivo en todo el pais.
					
					Tuvieron lugar con exito la competencia deportiva por la copa Paektusan (en febrero), el festival nacional de deportes por la copa Mangyongdae (en abril) y la competencia deportiva por la Copa Antorcha de Pochonbo (de mayo a junio).
					
					La Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo, que llego a su duodecima edicion desde su inicio en 1960, llevo al climax el fervor deportivo.
					
					En los festivales y torneos se renovaron los recordes mundiales y asiaticos y se establecieron nuevos recordes nacionales en muchas disciplinas.
					
					Se lograron exitos alentadores en futbol, tenis de mesa, natacion sincronica, etc. gracias a los esfuerzos de los jugadores estelares y los noveles prometedores.
					
					Bajo la gran atencion de los especialistas y aficionados, se efectuaron en abril, junio y septiembre, respectivamente, el festival nacional de Taekwondo por el Dia del Sol, el campeonato nacional de Taekwondo por la copa Jongilbong y el campeonato nacional de artes marciales por la copa 10 de septiembre.
					
					Con motivo del Dia del Sol y el primer Dia de la Estrella Luz, se efectuaron el 25o Torneo de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae de la Federacion Internacional de Atletas Amateurs, el XXI Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan y las representaciones ejemplares de patinaje sobre hielo y natacion sincronica fomentando el clima festivo.
					
					Tomaron auge tambien los deportes masivos.
					
					Tuvieron lugar exitosamente las competencias deportivas de funcionarios de organos centrales y obreros y el torneo de tenis de mesa de los funcionarios de comites, ministerios y organos centrales y otros muchos eventos.
					
					Se construyeron nuevamente muchos establecimientos deportivos incluyendo la villa de Taekwondo, la villa deportiva en el islote Yanggak, el centro de patinaje al aire libre del pueblo y el patinadero de ruedas, los parques deportivos, gracias a lo cual fue mejorada la base material y tecnica para el desarrollo deportivo del pais y la forja de constitucion fisica de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Se desplego dinamicamente la campana por sentar en alto nivel las ciencias y tecnicas deportivas y producir y suministrar muchos equipos deportivos de calidad.
